subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Quickscript in the NYTimes?
msgSnippet: ... I ve just started on this alphabet, and new to this list, I  hadn t yet thought about how it was similar/different to other languages I write. Thanks Jon!
messageBody:
> I think Read might have borrowed its shape consciously. (It isn't shown

I've just started on this alphabet, and new to this list, I hadn't
yet thought about how it was similar/different to other languages I
write. Thanks Jon!

If you want a chart of script/cursive Hebrew to the printed (book)
text [I don't have easily available Hebrew on this machine]:
http://www.amerisoftinc.com/hebletr1.htm

(I pulled this off of the first google hit I got)

/peninah

--
http://www.intracommunicate.com/peninah
